snippet: Defense Minister Alberto Otarola and Interior Minister Daniel Lozada resigned Thursday after clashes between the armed forces and Shining Path rebels provoked a public outcry.
abstract: Peru's Defense Min Alberto Otarola and Interior Min Daniel Lozada resign after clashes between the armed forces and Shining Path rebels provoke a public outcry, opening the door to more changes in the five-month-old cabinet of Pres Ollanta Humala.
lead_paragraph: Defense Minister Alberto Otarola and Interior Minister Daniel Lozada resigned Thursday after clashes between the armed forces and Shining Path rebels provoked a public outcry.
